message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I'm willing to let it go for $90. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love it!
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. I'm willing to make a deal at that price, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.

I understand your offer, Bob, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. It's a great product, and I think it's worth a bit more than that. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $82.50?
